name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
This one is actually quite classic.
In China’s propaganda tradition, from national events to pesticide ads, in order to increase the credibility of the event, a foreigner must be found to speak up. Even if there is none, one must be made up.
However, it is precisely this group of people who like to say that others worship foreign things and fawn on foreigners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: To be precise, all the wailing today can be summed up in one sentence: before, we could die together with others, but now we can only die together.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
There are many people jumping off buildings recently. Some Twitter users asked, why don’t they want to take a few white people with them?
Because for people who commit suicide, death is a kind of relief, it is to escape from troubles, not to add more troubles to themselves.
Resistance must be based on the desire to survive. When you know that you can’t resist, you give up the desire to live. That’s why we see people jumping off one after another.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why do people say that Qing dogs are a bunch of people who don't care about the lives of others? These are two good examples.
Picture 1: If I get infected with the new coronavirus, I will go to the streets and infect others.
Picture 2: I would rather attack Taiwan in advance than lie flat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@Rotarepmixer It is definitely meaningless to you.
But this student did something that he thought was meaningful.
And the purpose of my account is to amplify their voices, so that all those who want to speak but dare not speak know that they are not outliers, they are not alone.
That's enough.
Everyone knows the price they have to pay when doing this, and I also know the price I have to pay, so you don't need to worry about this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the past three years, whenever there was something like not being able to enter the hospital due to nucleic acid testing, the most popular thing the Qinggou in the comment area said was "Why should everyone take risks because of your family's problems?" Now the situation is exactly the opposite, why should the people of the whole country be locked up at home for your mother's health😆
